name: randstad-front
description: Randstad YPAM application to manage medical resources
author: Randstad

scripts.install: yarn run install:front && yarn run install:bff
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:front && yarn run lint:bff
scripts.lint:fix: (cd front && yarn run lint:fix) && (cd bff && yarn run lint:fix)
scripts.security_check: (cd front && yarn run security_check) && (cd bff && yarn run security_check)
scripts.test: yarn run test:front && yarn run test:bff
